name: pouchdb-adapter-cordova-sqlite
description: PouchDB adapter using Cordova SQLite Plugin as its data store.
author: Dale Harvey <dale@arandomurl.com>

scripts.build: mkdirp dist && browserify -s PouchAdapterCordovaSqlite -p bundle-collapser/plugin . > dist/pouchdb.cordova-sqlite.js && uglifyjs -mc < dist/pouchdb.cordova-sqlite.js > dist/pouchdb.cordova-sqlite.min.js
